#### JuliaCon

In late July, 2022, I presented three talks at [JuliaCon 2022](https://juliacon.org/2022/):

1. Explaining Black-Box Models through Counterfactuals
2. Effortless Bayesian Deep Learning through Laplace Redux
3. Julia and Quarto: a Match Made in Heaven?
